metadata.name: [REP+] Better Start
metadata.description:
This mod combines the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1264802784]Guaranteed Start[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1379926225]Item Room Start[/url] mods, while also including some additional fixes to address minor issues.
At the beginning of each run, this mod will: [list] [*] Remove the Curse of the Blind, if applied. [*] Teleport you to the Treasure Room (or the Silver Treasure Room in Greed Mode). [*] Ensure the item found there is of at least quality 3. [/list]
